thread.title: Jessie James Decker Posted a Beautiful Breastfeeding Photo of Her Newborn Son
thread.title_full: Jessie James Decker Posted a Beautiful Breastfeeding Photo of Her Newborn Son

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Jessie James Decker Posted a Beautiful Breastfeeding Photo of Her Newborn Son
text:
​Jessie James Decker just posted a photo of her breastfeeding her son Eric Thomas Decker II, who born Sept. 4. This is the second child for Jessie and her husband, football player Eric Decker.
"Love being a mommy and feeding my sweet boy," she wrote in her caption for the intimate photo.
Love being a mommy and feeding my sweet boy ❤️
A photo posted by Jessie James Decker (@jessiejamesdecker) on Oct 8, 2015 at 9:41am PDT
 Fans responded positively. "Breastfeeding is the most beautiful gift between a mother and a child. I breastfed my daughter and it's the best thing you could ever provide your child with. Love that you are supporting all the mom's [ ​sic ​] out there ​," one wrote. Another used the hashtag #NormalizeBreastfeeding in a comment.
Jessie is among several celebrities who have posted their breastfeeding photos to social media. Others include model Nicole Trunifo , "Six-Pack Model Mom" Sarah Stag e, and Gisele Bündchen, to name a few.
More From Cosmopolitan Jessie's daughter Vivianne was born in March of 2014 and Jessie posted photos to Instagram of her breastfeeding then as well.
Update 10/09/15 6:20 p.m.: ​ Commenters have been accusing Decker of faking her breastfeeding photo, so she responded — by posting a close up shot. "Here's a closer look to those accusing me of 'posing' this," reads the caption. "Here's the shot I took before but thought was maybe too visual. Now I don't care. Enjoy #normalizebreastfeeding"
Here's a closer look to those accusing me of "posing" this. Here's the shot I took before but thought was maybe too visual. Now I don't care. Enjoy #normalizebreastfeeding
A photo posted by Jessie James Decker (@jessiejamesdecker) on Oct 8, 2015 at 3:12pm PDT
​Follow Danielle on Twitter .
